title: How to Fold a Towel Dog

steps.headline: Roll the ends to the center.
Bend one roll to lay over the other as shown.
Fold the 'open' end toward the 'fold' end approximately 2/3rds or 3/4ths of the way, leaving 2 inches (5cm) uncovered.
Hold the corner, pull it up and toward the center.
Repeat for opposite end.

steps.headline: Right flap tucked under, left flap still waiting to be tucked in, forming the "forehead".

text:
Preparing the Towel Lay the bath towel flat. Roll the ends to the center. Folding the Towel Bend one roll to lay over the other as shown. Set aside. Lay hand towel flat. Fold it in half. Fold the 'open' end toward the 'fold' end approximately 2/3rds or 3/4ths of the way, leaving 2 inches (5cm) uncovered. Tuck the folded edge under. Hold the corner, pull it up and toward the center. Repeat for opposite end. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/4\/4d\/D11_314.JPG\/460px-D11_314.JPG","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/4\/4d\/D11_314.JPG\/550px-D11_314.JPG","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"550","bigHeight":"413","licensing":"

Image by: Uploader
\nLicense: Creative Commons<\/a>\n<\/p><\/div>"} Roll ends to middle. Pull the front flaps down. Right flap tucked under, left flap still waiting to be tucked in, forming the "forehead". Place "head" on "body". Display proudly!
sentences: Preparing the Towel Lay the bath towel flat.
Roll the ends to the center.
Folding the Towel Bend one roll to lay over the other as shown.
Fold the 'open' end toward the 'fold' end approximately 2/3rds or 3/4ths of the way, leaving 2 inches (5cm) uncovered.
Hold the corner, pull it up and toward the center.
